top_comments.comment: Well, we have to admit that Chucky is way sexier than Dave

comments_since_last_sample.body: Шикарно! С каждым видео все круче и круче!

Rozumiem, że to cover, ale według mnie bębny weszły za wcześnie. Jednak brakuje tego wejścia w ostatni refren. Szkoda, że fade out wjechał tak wcześnie, bo wokalistka dopiero wtedy rozwija skrzydła. To nie zmienia faktu, że miałem ciarki słuchając tego :)
I hope u are able to defend your position after stressing the bound's of behavior little girl:)

Ok, by a pure stroke of happenstance (Youtube) put one of videos as a suggestion.  I watched it,  I just knew that I had to hear your voice.  I, immediately, subscribed and I clicked on this video.  My dark goddess of covers....you have a voice that makes my dark heart want more.  Fuck the haters....you have REAL talent and should be proud of it.  I just wish I could download your covers and listen to them wherever I go.  Can't wait to listen to more of your covers and videos.
